events.message: I received my order last week, but the item was the wrong size and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The support system has reviewed the customer's message and classified the issue under the Refund category.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging?
My order number is 123456789. The item is still in its original packaging and I haven't used it at all.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the credit in your account within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the customer was notified accordingly.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
The case has been closed after confirmation that the refund was received and the customer was satisfied.
